#| label: trendsoutfunc
#| cache: true
#| cache.comments: false

hush <- function(code) {
  sink("NUL") # use /dev/null in UNIX
  tmp <- code
  sink()
  return(tmp)
}

estfunc_inner2 <- function(model, datain) {
  std_fit <- stdGlm(model, data = transform(datain, time = 36525), X = "indexyear_use")
  std_sum <- summary(std_fit, CI.type = "log")
  out <- std_sum[["est.table"]] %>%
    as_tibble(rownames = "indexyear_use") %>%
    mutate(
      indexyear = as.numeric(factor(indexyear_use)),
      r = paste0(fn(Estimate, 1), " (", fn(`lower 0.95`, 1), "-", fn(`upper 0.95`, 1), ")")
    )

  apc <- hush(csu_eapc(out,
    var_rate = "Estimate",
    var_year = "indexyear",
    var_eapc = "eapc"
  ))

  out <- out %>%
    select(indexyear_use, r) %>%
    add_row(
      indexyear_use = "eAPC",
      r = paste0(
        fn(apc$eapc, 1), " (", fn(apc$eapc_low, 1),
        " - ", fn(apc$eapc_up, 1), ")"
      )
    )
}

estfunc_inner <- function(data, event, time, novars = NULL, namegroup) {
  data <- data %>%
    rename(
      time = !!sym(time),
      event = !!sym(event)
    )

  ev <- data %>%
    group_by(indexyear_use) %>%
    summarise(
      ev = sum(event == "Yes"),
      s = sum(time / 365.25),
      n = n(),
      .groups = "drop"
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      r = ev / s * 100,
      event = paste0(ev, "/", fn(s, 0))
    ) %>%
    select(indexyear_use, n, event) %>%
    add_row(
      indexyear_use = "eAPC",
      n = NA_real_,
      event = ""
    )

  # crude
  poisson_fit <- glm(event == "Yes" ~ indexyear_use,
    offset = log(time / 365.25 / 100),
    data = data, family = poisson
  )
  crude <- estfunc_inner2(poisson_fit, datain = data)

  # age sex
  adjvars <- setdiff(c("shf_age", "shf_sex"), novars)
  poisson_fit <- glm(formula(paste0("event == 'Yes' ~ indexyear_use +", adjvars)),
    offset = log(time / 365.25 / 100),
    data = data, family = poisson
  )
  as <- estfunc_inner2(poisson_fit, datain = data)

  outall <- bind_cols(
    ev,
    crude %>% select(-indexyear_use),
    as %>% select(-indexyear_use)
  ) %>%
    mutate(var = namegroup) %>%
    select(var, everything())
}

estfunc <- function(event, time, agesex = T, yearstart = 2003, yearvar = "indexyear_fac") {
  data <- rsdata %>%
    filter(shf_indexyear >= yearstart) %>%
    mutate(indexyear_use = droplevels(!!sym(yearvar)))

  nyears <- nlevels(data %>% pull(indexyear_use)) + 1
  firstyears <- levels(data %>% pull(indexyear_use))[1]

  out0 <- estfunc_inner(data = data, event, time, namegroup = "All")
  out5 <- estfunc_inner(data = data %>% filter(advhftreat == "Yes"), event, time, namegroup = "Patients eligible for advanced HF therapy")

  if (agesex) {
    out1 <- estfunc_inner(data = data %>% filter(shf_age_cat == "<=70"), event, time, namegroup = "Age (years) <= 70")
    out2 <- estfunc_inner(data = data %>% filter(shf_age_cat == ">70"), event, time, namegroup = "Age (years) > 70")
    out3 <- estfunc_inner(data = data %>% filter(shf_sex == "Female"), event, time, novars = "shf_sex", namegroup = "Female")
    out4 <- estfunc_inner(data = data %>% filter(shf_sex == "Male"), event, time, novars = "shf_sex", namegroup = "Male")

    outall <- bind_rows(out0, out1, out2, out3, out4, out5)
    rowspecs <- seq(nyears, nyears * 5, nyears)
  }
  if (!agesex) {
    outall <- bind_rows(out0, out5)
    rowspecs <- seq(nyears, nyears * 1, nyears)
  }

  cl <- c("Patients", "Year", "N", "Events/sum py", "Crude", "Adjusted age, sex")

  outall <- outall %>%
    mutate(var = if_else(indexyear_use == firstyears, var, ""))

  if (output) {
    make_one_xlsxsheet(outall, colnames = cl)
  }

  default_kable(outall,
    col.names = cl,
    longtable = TRUE,
    font_size = 6.5
  ) %>%
    add_header_above(c(" " = 1, " " = 1, " " = 1, " " = 1, "Incidence rate/100 person-years (95 % CI) " = 2)) %>%
    row_spec(rowspecs, hline_after = T)
}
